docs.snippet: Government opponents pointed to recent actions to intimidate demonstrators, like sending cellphone messages saying, “You are registered as a participant in a mass disturbance.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Government opponents pointed to recent actions to intimidate demonstrators, like sending cellphone messages saying, “You are registered as a participant in a mass disturbance.”
docs.abstract: Opposition leaders in Ukraine accuse government of provoking same violence it has condemned in effort to discredit and possible split the protest movement; assert that several recent actions, like passing laws circumscribing right of public assembly, blocking a protest march and sending cellphone messages, are designed to intimidate demonstrators.

headline.main: Ukraine’s Opposition Says Government Stirs Violence
headline.print_headline: Ukraine’s Opposition Says Government Stirs Violence

byline.contributor: Andrew Higgins contributed reporting from Brussels, and Oksana Lyachynska from Kiev.

docs.snippet: In this lesson we offer a math-focused list of 10 ways students can learn from and tell stories with the numbers in some recent charts, tables and interactives found in The Times....
docs.abstract: In this lesson we offer a math-focused list of 10 ways students can learn from and tell stories with the numbers in some recent charts, tables and interactives found in The Times.

headline.main: Interpreting the Data: 10 Ways to Teach Math and More Using Infographics

byline.original: By PATRICK HONNER and MICHAEL GONCHAR

docs.snippet: The gambling boom around professional tennis has introduced the public to a new term: courtsiding, which is described as a “type of cheating and betting on sports.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The gambling boom around professional tennis has introduced the public to a new term: courtsiding, which is described as a “type of cheating and betting on sports.”
docs.abstract: Scandal surrounding Daniel Dobson, man accused of using technology to transmit data live from the Australian Open to his employer, has brought concerns about data harvesting in professional tennis to the fore; Dobson's ploy allowed gambling consulting company Sporting Data access to key information as much as 10 seconds faster than through official channels.

byline.original: By GREG BISHOP and JOHN MARTIN

docs.snippet: The Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed a well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting celebrity fans at Madison Square Garden....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed a well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting celebrity fans at Madison Square Garden.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting big-name fans at Madison Square Garden, seating A-level celebrities at six prime courtside seats; in exchange, stars are often asked to be filmed during games or appear in team's promotional and recruitment videos.

headline.main: Knicks Have a Star Magnet: Courtside Seats
headline.print_headline: Knicks Have a Star Magnet: Courtside Seats
